      • getExecutor

        ExecutorService getExecutor()
        This method is used by all code to create and execute asynchronous tasks.

        Ensure that when calling TaskContext.runLater(BasePlugin, Runnable, long) or TaskContext.runTimer(BasePlugin, Runnable, long, long), that this executor returns an instance of ScheduledExecutorService

        Returns:
        the executor of this plugin
